description: This Pumpkin Spice Mudslide is the perfect way to cool down on a hot day. It has everything we love about classic, creamy cocktails with just enough pumpkin pie flavor that it will make you feel like fall without changing anything else!
name: Pumpkin Spice Mudslide
recipeIngredient: Â¼ tsp. Pumpkin pie spice extract or pumpkin pie spice

recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice. Shake well until combined.
recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice. Shake well until combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into glass, garnish with whipped cream, and sprinkles of pumpkin pie spice if desired.
